title: Episode 329 - In the Beginning, Woman Was the Sun, Part 1
description: This week, we start off our first ever twinned biography with a look at the early career of one of Japan's pioneering feminists: Hiratsuka Raicho.
content:encoded: This week, we start off our first ever twinned biography with a look at the early career of one of Japan's pioneering feminists: Hiratsuka Raicho.
